query.statement:
SELECT T.UPJANG, T.SUBINV_NAME, T.ITEM_CODE, T.ITEM_NAME, T.SALE_PRICE, T.TAX_CODE, T.SALE_RATE, ROUND(T.SALE_PRICE / (1 + (T.SALE_RATE/100))) SALE_AMT, T.SALE_PRICE - ROUND(T.SALE_PRICE / (1 + DECODE(T.TAX_CODE,'100',NVL(T.SALE_RATE,0),NVL(T.FM_NOSALE_RATE,0))/100)) SALE_AMT2 FROM ( SELECT /*+ USE_HASH(D)*/ A.UPJANG, A.SUBINV_NAME, A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_NAME, A.SALE_PRICE, A.TAX_CODE, MIN(NVL(D.FM_SALE_RATE, NVL(E.FM_SALE_RATE, F.FM_SALE_RATE))) AS SALE_RATE, MIN(NVL(D.FM_NOSALE_RATE, NVL(E.FM_NOSALE_RATE, F.FM_NOSALE_RATE))) AS FM_NOSALE_RATE FROM (SELECT A.UPJANG, A.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_CLASS1, B.ITEM_CLASS2, B.ITEM_CLASS3, B.ITEM_CLASS4, A.SALE_PRICE, A.CONTRACT_START, D.SUBINV_CODE, D.SUBINV_NAME, B.TAX_CODE FROM HLDC_PO_CONTRACT_FSALE A, HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST B, HLDC_ST_UPJANG C, HLDC_PO_SUBINVENTORY D WHERE 1=1 AND A.UPJANG = C.AP_UNITPRICE_UPJANG AND A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE AND B.ITEM_CLASS1 = 'F' AND #SDATE# BETWEEN A.CONTRACT_START AND NVL(A.CONTRACT_END,'99999999') AND A.SALE_PRICE > 0 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND A.UPJANG = D.UPJANG
AND D.SUBINV_CODE = #SUBINV_CODE#
AND B.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #ITEM_NAME# || '%'
AND B.ITEM_CLASS2 = #ITEM_CLASS2#
AND B.ITEM_CLASS3 = #ITEM_CLASS3#
AND B.ITEM_CLASS4 = #ITEM_CLASS4#
) A, (SELECT A.SUBINV_CODE, A.ITEM_CODE, A.FM_SALE_RATE, A.FM_NOSALE_RATE FROM FMS_ITEM_SALE_RATE A -- 자재별 WHERE A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
AND A.SUBINV_CODE = #SUBINV_CODE#
AND A.CASH_CODE = '003' AND #SDATE# BETWEEN A.SDATE AND A.EDATE AND (A.FM_SALE_RATE > 0 OR A.FM_NOSALE_RATE > 0) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) D, (SELECT A.SUBINV_CODE, A.ITEM_CLASS AS ITEM_CLASS4, A.FM_SALE_RATE, A.FM_NOSALE_RATE FROM FMS_SALE_RATE A -- 소분류별 WHERE A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
AND A.SUBINV_CODE = #SUBINV_CODE#
AND A.CASH_CODE = '003' AND LENGTH(A.ITEM_CLASS) = 7 AND #SDATE# BETWEEN A.SDATE AND A.EDATE AND (A.FM_SALE_RATE > 0 OR A.FM_NOSALE_RATE > 0) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) E, (SELECT A.SUBINV_CODE, A.ITEM_CLASS AS ITEM_CLASS3, A.FM_SALE_RATE, A.FM_NOSALE_RATE FROM FMS_SALE_RATE A -- 중분류별 WHERE A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
AND A.SUBINV_CODE = #SUBINV_CODE#
AND A.CASH_CODE = '003' AND LENGTH(A.ITEM_CLASS) = 5 AND #SDATE# BETWEEN A.SDATE AND A.EDATE AND (A.FM_SALE_RATE > 0 OR A.FM_NOSALE_RATE > 0) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ) F WHERE A.ITEM_CODE = D.ITEM_CODE(+) AND A.ITEM_CLASS4 = E.ITEM_CLASS4(+) AND A.ITEM_CLASS3 = F.ITEM_CLASS3(+) AND A.SUBINV_CODE = D.SUBINV_CODE(+) AND A.SUBINV_CODE = E.SUBINV_CODE(+) AND A.SUBINV_CODE = F.SUBINV_CODE(+) GROUP BY A.UPJANG, A.SUBINV_NAME, A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_NAME, A.SALE_PRICE, A.TAX_CODE ) T
